name: Rainbow Moonstone & Crystal Quartz Stretch Bracelet! Genuine Crystals!
description:
Rainbow Moonstone & Brazilian Crystal Quartz stretch bracelet! This is an all natural, handmade bracelet using only genuine crystals and gemstones.




Rainbow or Blue Moonstone is a white to clear  stone with an amazing blue flash! 
It's a powerful healing stone that brings inner peace, strength and love. It has been used to relieve stress and enhance intuition as well.


Moonstone is also known as the feminine goddess stone. It can bring balance to masculine energy or strengthen feminine energy. For this reason it is also known as a great tool for balancing Yin and Yang energies!


Moonstone is most commonly associated with the Heart, Throat, Third Eye and Crown Chakras.

Zodiac Influences: Gemini~Cancer~Leo

Crystal Quartz is a master healer that brings clarity to any situation. This crystal reminds us to change our perspective and see from all sides. Itâ€™s also used to cleanse and then amplify positive energy.


Crystal Quartz is a powerful healer that can be used in ALL CHAKRAS and influences ALL ZODIAC signs!




This bracelet is handmade with love in the USA using only
high quality components!
